txt.en: Wild herbs can be found in the southern edge of the Wildwood.\n\nYou should collect wild herbs.
A storage crate can be found in either Trader's Wharf or Trestlebridge.\n\nYou should place the wild herbs in a storage crate.
Place the wild herbs in a storage crate
Someone has posted a task to collect herbs in the Wildwood.
The bulletin notice reads:\n\n'Needed: Herbs from the Wildwood for meals and trade. You will be rewarded for your efforts.'
